name: Mitigation Playbook for Web Application Exploit Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exploited a vulnerable web application to gain command line access and created backdoor user accounts.

parallel--e2910cf7-e1a5-49c8-8e8e-c170eb.name: Execute Mitigations
parallel--e2910cf7-e1a5-49c8-8e8e-c170eb.description: Perform necessary mitigations in parallel to expedite response.

action--3d0f26b3-1242-4db9-88b6-e846558f.name: Kill malicious process
action--3d0f26b3-1242-4db9-88b6-e846558f.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--cfa834da-4e24-44d7-9262-6f2c6368.name: Remove unauthorized user accounts
action--cfa834da-4e24-44d7-9262-6f2c6368.description: Delete the backdoor user account created by the attacker.

action--a8b21b8e-9d5f-4f2e-872e-15b1ae4e.name: Run malware scan
action--a8b21b8e-9d5f-4f2e-872e-15b1ae4e.description: Perform a comprehensive malware scan on the system.

loop--d5e12e49-3d66-4870-8561-1785b64efc.name: Check Scan Results
loop--d5e12e49-3d66-4870-8561-1785b64efc.description: Repeat the malware scan until the system is clean.

action--9a28b918-748b-49f6-abae-8fa76df6.name: Review server access logs
action--9a28b918-748b-49f6-abae-8fa76df6.description: Check server access logs for signs of lateral movement.

action--escalate_incident.name: Escalate Incident
action--escalate_incident.description: Escalate the incident for further investigation due to detected lateral movement.

commands.command: echo 'Lateral movement detected, escalate for further investigation.'
